cast.name: 埃兹格.阿萨奥古鲁 Ezgi Asaroglu
玉兹戈.博拉克 Özge Borak
汗德.多干黛蜜尔 Hande Dogandemir
卡安·乌尔甘哲奥卢 Kaan Urgancioglu

introduction: Leyla ile Mecnun is a famous Turkish TV-series. The story is about the love between Leyla and Mecnun that's based on the famous Persian love-story "Leyli and Majnoun". The story begins when two babies, who were born on the same day, were put together on the same bed because there weren't enough beds. The fathers of the babies gave them names of a sensational and legendary love, Leyla and Mecnun and vowed that in the future their children will get married.Leyla is a rich and beautiful girl. What's making her exceptional is that despite the fact that Leyla is the only girl of a rich family, she's not as arrogant as the typical spoiled rich girl. Leyla has a pure and innocent heart with a modest character. Mecnun is a messy person from a middle-class family. He also has a pure heart and has such a nice and funny character that he can't harm anyone physically or with words.Both are aged 25 now. After all these years they would meet again. Mecnun insantly fell in love with Leyla at the first sight and since that day he is doing is best to gain her heart. With the help of Dede appearing in Mecnun's dreams and later appearing in the real world, the two lover's eternal love can keep up against the evil Arda and his father, who try to break them up.Leyla ile Mecnun is brilliant tv-series mixing comedy with drama where you will shed your tears for at some points. Together with a touchy story and enjoyable comedy, this series is one of the best comedy series ever.
